title: Bug splat Error when in queue
body: Hey everyone, my client keeps closing once I'm about 60 seconds into a queue and it's because of a bug splat error. If anyone can help me figure out what's wrong, that'd be great

replies.body:
Those bugsplats can be more annoying than actual bugs sometimes -_-'

Most of the time you'll only see those bugsplats when the client crashes and it just can't figure out what went wrong. Sometimes it happens from weird software errors and other times it an odd hardware-software interaction. Let's make sure we cover all our bases with the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974), and let me know how that helps.
